participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and curious, always eager to experience new things.
participant_1.background: i never broke a bone in my body ever in my life. i was raised in a single parent household. i read twenty books a year. i am a stunt double as my second job.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Caring and practical, with a hint of humor, enjoys making connections.
participant_2.background: my father drove a car for nascar. my favorite color is grey. i am employed by the us postal service. i'm terrified of scorpions. i have a german shepherd named barnaby.
